features: PREMIUM Hair Thickening Fibres - Made in the UK
TRANSFORM thinning or fine hair in seconds
INSTANT natural looking coverage and thickness
COLOUR LOCK technology means there will be no staining to your skin or clothing
Made from 100% natural keratin / contains no parabens: perfect for men and women who have sensitive scalps and those wanting a natural finish
400%* better binding of the fibres to each hair strand than leading competitors
description: Product Description Nanogen’s 100% natural Keratin Hair Fibres are the perfect way to add volume and thickness to fine or thinning hair. Our premium hair fibres can be applied easily to conceal any areas of hair thinning or scalp show through in seconds. Directions Apply to dry hair. STEP 1 Style your hair as normal. STEP 2 Lightly sprinkle on areas where thicker hair is needed. Blend fibres with your fingers. STEP 3 For best results and to impart water resistance, use Hair Fibre Locking Spray (sold separately). Safety Warning External application only. Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes rinse well with water. If irritation occurs cease use. Avoid inhalation. See more
